Name: test_an_application_can_connect_to_multiple_aliased_database_clusters
Description: Test that an application can connect to different clusters of the same database.

Name: test_enable_rbac
Description:
Enables RBAC from inside test runner's environment.

    Assert on permission enforcement being active.

Name: test_no_read_only_endpoint_in_standalone_cluster
Description: Test that there is no read-only endpoint in a standalone cluster.

Name: test_build_and_deploy
Description: Build and deploy three units of PostgreSQL.

Name: test_invalid_config_and_recovery_after_fixing_it
Description: Test that the charm can handle invalid and valid backup configurations.

Name: test_config_parameters
Description: Build and deploy one unit of PostgreSQL and then test config with wrong parameters.

Name: test_an_application_can_connect_to_multiple_database_clusters
Description: Test that an application can connect to different clusters of the same database.

Name: test_redeploy_charm_same_model_after_forcing_removal
Description: Redeploy the charm in the same model to test that it works after a forceful removal.

Name: test_user_with_extra_roles
Description: Test superuser actions and the request for more permissions.

Name: test_backup_and_restore
Description: Build and deploy two units of PostgreSQL and then test the backup and restore actions.

Name: test_forceful_restart_without_data_and_transaction_logs
Description: A forceful restart with deleted data and without transaction logs (forced clone).

Name: test_full_cluster_restart[SIGTERM-postgres]
Description:
This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

    The test can be called a full cluster crash when the signal sent to the OS process
    is SIGKILL.

Name: test_async_replication
Description: Test async replication between two PostgreSQL clusters.

Name: test_postgresql_parameters_change
Description: Test that's possible to change PostgreSQL parameters.

Name: test_automatic_failover_after_leader_issue
Description: Tests that an automatic failover is triggered after an issue happens in the leader.

Name: test_password_rotation
Description: Test password rotation action.

Name: test_redeploy_charm_same_model
Description: Redeploy the charm in the same model to test that it works.

Name: test_reelection
Description: Kill primary unit, check reelection.

Name: test_database_relation_with_charm_libraries
Description: Test basic functionality of database relation interface.

Name: test_pre_upgrade_check
Description: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.

Name: test_build_and_deploy
Description:
Build the charm-under-test and deploy it.

    Assert on the unit status before any relations/configurations take place.

Name: test_mattermost_db
Description:
Deploy Mattermost to test the 'db' relation.

    Mattermost needs TLS enabled on PostgreSQL to correctly connect to it.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework

Name: test_scale_down_and_up
Description: Test data is replicated to new units after a scale up.

Name: test_promote_standby
Description: Test promoting the standby cluster.

Name: test_password_from_secret_same_as_cli
Description:
Checking if password is same as returned by CLI.

    I.e. we're manipulating the secret we think we're manipulating.

Name: test_persist_data_through_failure
Description: Test data persists through a failure.

Name: test_relation_broken
Description: Test that the user is removed when the relation is broken.

Name: test_reestablish_relation
Description: Test that the relation can be broken and re-established.

Name: test_build_and_deploy
Description: Build and deploy three unit of PostgreSQL.

Name: test_finos_waltz_db
Description:
Deploy Finos Waltz to test the 'db' relation.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework

Description:
This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

Description: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.

Description: Test that the charm can be deployed with a storage with more restrictive permissions.

Description: Test that there is read-only endpoint in a scaled up cluster.

Description: Test that in general, there is no change when password validation fails.

Description: Test that async replication works when scaling the clusters.

Description: Test that an application can request additional databases using the same interface.

This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.

Description: Test updating from stable channel.

Trust existing blocked deployment.

Description: Tries to regain connectivity to model after microK8s restart.

Name: test_async_replication_failover_in_secondary_cluster
Description: Test that async replication fails back correctly.

This tests checks that a cluster recovers from a full cluster restart.
